about.title: About me
about.description: Hi! I'm Liu Huilin, My work spans multiple areas, including gameplay R&D, technical art, product design, and more...

career.douyin_live_desc1: Initiate the "interactive effect" capability for Douyin Live, which allows like and gift behaviors to affect the livestream screen.
career.douyin_live_desc2: It reaches a maximum of 70,000+ anchors and an average daily revenue of 1 million+ CNY.
career.douyin_live_desc3: Develop corresponding components and blueprint templates in Effect House tool, serving 300+ UGC artists to achieve efficient high-volume launch of such effects.
career.douyin_live_desc4: Awarded the First Prize in Douyin Hackathon.
career.interactive_desc1: For ByteDance application products such as TikTok CapCut, based on a internal self-developed engine, develop online visual effects
career.interactive_desc2: Including shader editing, gameplay development, production efficiency improvement, performance optimization, etc.
career.interactive_desc3: Supported: TikTok interactive games / AR exhibition / CapCut effect

about.title: 关于我
about.description: 你好！我是刘慧琳，我的工作涉及到游戏玩法研发、技术美术、产品设计等多个领域。

career.douyin_live: 抖音直播: 智能创作研发
career.douyin_live_desc1: 结合抖音音频能力与画面识别能力,支持主播与观众在画面内互动的音乐类游戏与pk对战类游戏研发
career.douyin_live_desc2: 抖音Effect House工具内研发相应组件与蓝图模板,服务于300+UGC特效师,实现这类特效批量高效上线
career.douyin_live_desc3: 作为关键推动者,起步搭建观众点赞、送礼行为对直播画面产生影响的"互动特效"通信能力,该功能使用主播数量最多达到7w+,日均营收多达100w+
career.douyin_live_desc4: 直播交互特效项目获得抖音Hackathon大赛一等奖
career.interactive_engineer: 智能创作中台: 交互工程师
career.interactive_desc1: 针对字节跳动抖音、剪映等应用,基于内部自研引擎与视觉识别算法,开发AR视觉效果
career.interactive_desc2: 工作内容: Shader编辑、Gameplay玩法开发、工作流效率提升、线上性能优化等
career.interactive_desc3: 支持项目: 抖音好友互动游戏/AR艺术展布展/剪映醒图人像特效研发

douyin_mv.title: 抖音直播: MV特效
douyin_mv.subtitle:
在抖音直播板块，主导研发使唱跳才艺主播的直播画面随着音乐产生相应视效的能力；
且将原子视效开放给UGC创作者，使这一直播效果能够由用户DIY并大批量上线
